item.title: matrixA_function
item.author: hmz1969a@gmail.com (YuKi)
item.description: ###############################library packages############################# #base #install.packages('tidyverse') #install.packages('bruceR') library('tidyverse') ## ── Attaching packages ─────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse 1.3.2 ── ## ✔ ggplot2 3.3.6 ✔ purrr 0.3.4 ## ✔ tibble 3.1.8 ✔ dplyr 1.0.10 ## ✔ tidyr 1.2.1 ✔ stringr 1.4.1 ## ✔ readr 2.1.2 ✔ forcats 0.5.2 ## ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── ## ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() ## ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() library('bruceR') ## ## bruceR (version 0.8.9) ## BRoadly Useful Convenient and Efficient R functions ## ## Packages also loaded: ## √ dplyr √ emmeans √ ggplot2 ## √ tidyr √ effectsize √ ggtext ## √ stringr √ performance √ cowplot ## √ forcats √ lmerTest √ see ## √ data.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.author: hmz1969a@gmail.com (YuKi)
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
